'''Deborah Fleiss''' was shot when [[Petey]] started firing on a restaurant.

==History==
Deborah and her fiancé, [[Neal Hannigan|Neal]], were paying at the register at a restaurant when [[Petey]] came in and started shooting. Deborah was shot and the bullet went through her arm and grazed Neal, who had ducked behind her when he heard gunshots.

Their wounds were irrigated and they were sent to x-ray to find the bullets.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
She was engaged to [[Neal Hannigan]]. They had already sent out invitations to their wedding, which was six weeks away. She broke it off when he ducked behind her during a shooting. After a day in the hospital together, she decided to give him another chance only to break it off again when he ducked behind her a second time.

[[es:Deborah Fleiss]]
